name: Reima Tuulia Dress - Girls' - Children to Youths
description: Playing in the sun can work up a sweat. This dress is made with a safe, sweat-activated xylitol treatment to keep little ones cooler when the sun is shining.Stretchy polyester and elastane has UPF 40+ sun protection.Fabric treated with Xylitol Cool active cooling technology.Flowy, casual fit.
